page.title: 07Quarrying
page.content: There is a number of small abandoned quarries in this area and one active quarry where{limestone}is extracted and concrete bricks and blocks are produced.The limestone is used in a number of ways. 1.To produce{cement. 2.To produce{quicklime. 3.For use in{chemical industries. 4.To provide{aggregates}for concrete and roadstone. Quicklime is used in the steel industry and lime products are used in the purification of domestic water. Many people are employed in local quarries and there is a lot of employment in peripheral trades . Frequent applications for extensions of quarries are made and usually result in{public enquiries-}there is a conflict between industry,farming and environmental interests.
